hero.sub: I design and build scalable systems for SaaS founders and product teams. Available for contract work and product discussions.

services.title: CRMs & Business Tools
services.description: Custom CRM systems and internal business tools built for scalability and maintainability. Focus on data architecture, user workflows, and system integration.

services.title: Dashboards & SaaS Interfaces
services.description: Data visualization dashboards and SaaS product interfaces. Emphasis on performance, real-time updates, and intuitive user experience.

services.title: System Architecture
services.description: Designing and implementing scalable system architectures. Database design, API structure, component organization, and maintainable code patterns.

services.title: Product Engineering
services.description: Full-stack product development with focus on engineering decisions, technical strategy, and long-term maintainability.

testimonials.quote: Working with Vladimir was exceptional. He delivered a website that not only looks great but performs flawlessly. Our conversion rates improved significantly.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: The attention to detail and technical expertise is outstanding. Our new website is fast, accessible, and exactly what we envisioned.
testimonials.author: Marcus Rodriguez

testimonials.quote: Vladimir transformed our online presence. The website is professional, user-friendly, and has helped us attract more clients than ever before.
testimonials.author: Elena Kowalski

about.intro: I'm Vladimir Bogryashov, a frontend developer specializing in creating high-performance, accessible websites. With a focus on clean code and clear design, I help businesses establish a strong online presence that drives real results.

values.title: Clarity
values.description: Clear communication and transparent processes throughout every project.

values.title: Progress
values.description: Continuous improvement and staying current with the latest web technologies.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Open communication, regular updates, and honest feedback on project progress.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Delivering exceptional quality and attention to detail in every line of code.

contact.title: Let's Discuss Your Product
